name: Breathless (2015)
description:
Breathless, affection in times of infection. Glitch script applied to a dithered databended image. 
Trust the process. Original image was databended several times and animated assembling the glitched still images in a .gif. This .gif was glitched and then screen recorded as it was looping. This recording was dithered and then processed through a glitch generative script. The work is part of my years of research in file formats interpretation, corruptiction, coding, decoding, altering and rendering image file format data.
